# High-dimensional datasets

# Examples of data analyses/visualizations

-   [Advanced data visualizations by Tanya Shapiro](https://github.com/tashapiro/tanya-data-viz): Going above and beyond the basic capabilities of R visualizations
-   [Data visualization with NFL data by Bradley J Congelio](https://bradcongelio.com/nfl-analytics-with-r-book/04-nfl-analytics-visualization.html): Great example of using R to generate advanced data visualizations about the NFL.
-   [Exploring college major and income: a live data analysis in R by David Robinson](http://varianceexplained.org/r/tidy-tuesday-college-major/): Video example of a data analysis, in real time.
